/22

17.18.16.0/22 -- 00010001.00010010.000100|00.0000000/22

6 subrețele => 3 biti => /22 + 3 biti = /25

00010001.00010010.000100|00.0000000/25

Cele 6 subrețele vor avea, respectiv adresele:

00010001.00010010.000100|00.00000000/25 = 17.18.16.0/25
00010001.00010010.000100|00.10000000/25 = 17.18.16.128/25
00010001.00010010.000100|01.00000000/25 = 17.18.17.0/25
00010001.00010010.000100|01.10000000/25 = 17.18.17.128/25
00010001.00010010.000100|10.00000000/25 = 17.18.18.0/25
00010001.00010010.000100|10.10000000/25 = 17.18.18.128/25

Ultima adresă asignabilă din cadrul fiecărei subrețele va fi, respectiv:

00010001.00010010.000100|00.01111110/25 = 17.18.16.126/25
00010001.00010010.000100|00.11111110/25 = 17.18.16.254/25
00010001.00010010.000100|01.01111110/25 = 17.18.17.126/25
00010001.00010010.000100|01.11111110/25 = 17.18.17.254/25
00010001.00010010.000100|10.01111110/25 = 17.18.18.126/25
00010001.00010010.000100|10.11111110/25 = 17.18.18.254/25
